means: 不承认，抵赖，拒绝对…承担责任

sentence.Network_en: I disavow all responsibility for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不承认对你有任何责任.

sentence.Network_en: How important is it to disavow obligation to it?
sentence.Network_cn: 否定对过往记忆的义务很重要 吗 ?

list.abs: the Arab world must do more , pressing Hamas to disavow violence , publicly pledge not to resume the firing of rockets at Israeli civilians and revoke its anti-Semitic charter .阿拉伯世界必须做更多的事情，敦促哈马斯放弃暴力，迫使其公开承诺不再使用火箭弹袭击以色列平民，并撤销它的反犹太人宣言。
i disavow all responsibility for you ., 我不承认对你有任何责任.
on bankrupt soes and the personality disavowing principle of corporate actors ., 论国有破产企业与法人人格否认原则.
They publicly disavowed any connection with terrorist groups ., 他们公然否认与恐怖集团有任何联系.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desavouer

entry.tran: 否认;不承认;拒绝对…承担责任
entry.def: If you disavow something, you say that you are not connected with it or responsible for it.

example.ex: Dr. Samuels immediately disavowed the newspaper story.
example.tran: 赛缪尔斯博士当即对新闻报道予以了否认。

means.word_mean: 1. refuse to acknowledge; disclaim knowledge of; responsibility for, or association with;

sentences.sentence: "Her husband disavowed her after 30 years of marriage and six children"

auth_sentence.content: On network television, no news star would openly disavow Murrow's legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: On network television, no news star would openly disavow Murrow's legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On network television, no news star would openly disavow Murrow's legacy.

auth_sentence.content: Perry spokesman Mark Miner told the Associated Press that Perry would not disavow Jeffress.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perry spokesman Mark Miner told the Associated Press that Perry would not disavow Jeffress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perry spokesman Mark Miner told the Associated Press that Perry would not disavow Jeffress.

auth_sentence.content: He was later to disavow the book, and never allowed any part to be reprinted.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was later to disavow the book, and never allowed any part to be reprinted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was later to disavow the book, and never allowed any part to be reprinted.

means.word_mean: 不承认,抵赖,拒绝对…承担责任

sentences.en: I disavow all responsibility for you.
sentences.cn: 我不承认对你有任何责任。

sentences.en: Her husband disavowed her after 15 years of marriage and six children.
sentences.cn: 她的丈夫在和她结婚15年有6个孩子后抵赖不认她。
